name: GeoTLD Group
goal: The GeoTLD Group is an association to represent (a) organizations who are operating a top-level domain that is based on a geographic name, geographic identifier or geographic origin with the purpose of serving the respective geographic region and (b) those who have been and/or are engaged and/or intend to be involved in the advocacy, promotion, provision, governance, implementation, deployment, popularization, research and development of top-level domains which are based on a geographic name, geographic identifier or geographic origin with the purpose of serving the respective geographic region.
interests: Communication, Economic and Financial Affairs, Information Society, Trans-European Networks
